event-details.body: This is the description of the event provided by the organiser.

event-pricing.body: These are the published tickets and prices for the event at this time. These may change in the future.

terms.body:
Accept the terms and conditions only if you wish the organiser of this event to recieve your information

This will allow the orgnaiser to be notified that you are interested in attending the the event. At submission they will gain the names of the members you are submitting.
